name: dovecot
description: Dovecot is a widely used open-source IMAP and POP3 email server focused on security and performance. It runs as a daemon on Unix-like systems, providing mailbox storage, authentication, and extensible plugins for mail infrastructures.

features.title: Imap And Pop3
features.description: Retrieve email from mailboxes using standard protocols compatible with all major mail clients

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Handle thousands of concurrent connections with efficient indexing and caching for fast mailbox access

features.title: Mailbox Formats
features.description: Store messages in Maildir, mbox, or dbox formats with automatic conversion and migration tools

features.title: Sieve Filtering
features.description: Process incoming mail with server-side rules for sorting, forwarding, and automated responses

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Extend functionality with modules for quota management, full-text search, and replication

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Run with minimal privileges and support TLS encryption to protect credentials and message content
